definitions.body: under fig. of son of [[רַעֲמָה]] and grandson of [[כּוּשׁ]] (v. these arts.) Ge 10:7 (brother of [[שְׁבָא]]) = 1Ch 1:9, Ez Eze 27:20; cf. ´[[בְּנֵי ד]] v:Eze 27:15 (but rd. here perh. [[רדן]] LXX ui(oi\ (Rodi/wn, cf. Sta:De Pop. Javan. 11, also SerVer drn Co; v. sub [[דּׂדָנִים]] infr.) cf. also Ez Eze 38:13, ´[[שְׁבָא וּד]]; also Je 25:23; south-Arabian tribe on Persian Gulf, = Sab. [[בנו]] [[דדן]] acc. to DHM:ZMG 1876, 122; Sab. Denkm. 28 (dubit. Mordt); but in NW. of Arabian peninsula, Glaser:Skizze ii. 391 ff.; perhaps orig. further south cf. Di Ge 10:7.
as son of [[יׇקְשָׁן]] father of [[אַשּׁוּרִם]] etc., Ge 25:3, Ge 25:3 (here also brother of [[שְׁבָא]]) = 1Ch 1:32; Je 49:8 ´[[ישְׁבֵי ד]]. This is appar. a northern branch of
, cf. Di Ge 25:3.—On [[דדן]] in Mi:31, Mi:31 cf. Sm & So:MI p. 29 Nö:LCB Jan. 8, 1887 Cl Gann:JAs. Jan. 1887. 107.
